verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%>, that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H7121>cry<s%> against it; for their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H1272>flee<s%> unto <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa<s%>; and he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H591>ship<s%> <S%H935>going<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>: so he <S%H5414>paid<s%> the <S%H7939>fare<s%> thereof, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> into it, to <S%H935>go<s%> with them unto <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> sent <S%H2904>out<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and there was a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H5591>tempest<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, so that the <S%H591>ship<s%> was <S%H2803>like<s%> to be <S%H7665>broken<s%>.

Then the <S%H4419>mariners<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H430>god<s%>, and cast <S%H2904>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>wares<s%> that were in the <S%H591>ship<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, to <S%H7043>lighten<s%> it of them. But <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was gone <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H5600>ship<s%>; and he <S%H7901>lay<s%>, and was fast <S%H7290>asleep<s%>.

So the <S%H7227%H2259>shipmaster<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What meanest thou, O <S%H7290>sleeper<s%>? <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon thy <S%H430>God<s%>, if so be that <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6245>think<s%> upon us, that we <S%H6>perish<s%> not.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> for whose <S%H7945>cause<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> is upon us. So they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>, and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they unto him, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> us, we pray thee, for whose cause this <S%H7451>evil<s%> is upon us; What is thine <S%H4399>occupation<s%>? and <S%H370>whence<s%> <S%H935>comest<s%> thou? what is thy <S%H776>country<s%>? and of what <S%H5971>people<s%> art thou?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I am an <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>; and I <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, which hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land.

Then were the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1419%H3374>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Why hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> this? For the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, because he had <S%H5046>told<s%> them.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> they unto him, What shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee, that the <S%H3220>sea<s%> may be <S%H8367>calm<s%> unto us? for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1980>wrought<s%>, and was <S%H5590>tempestuous<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Take me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and cast me <S%H2904>forth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; so shall the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be <S%H8367>calm<s%> unto you: for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that for my <S%H7945>sake<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>tempest<s%> is upon you.

Nevertheless the <S%H582>men<s%> rowed <S%H2864>hard<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> it to the <S%H3004>land<s%>; but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not: for the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1980>wrought<s%>, and was <S%H5590>tempestuous<s%> against them.

Wherefore they <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We beseech <S%H577>thee<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, we beseech thee, let us not <S%H6>perish<s%> for this <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%>, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> not upon us <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: for thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, hast <S%H6213>done<s%> as it <S%H2654>pleased<s%> thee.
So they took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>, and cast him <S%H2904>forth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5975>ceased<s%> from her <S%H2197>raging<s%>.

Then the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1419%H3374>exceedingly<s%>, and <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5087>made<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%>.

¶ Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4487>prepared<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1709>fish<s%> to swallow <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%>. And <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was in the <S%H4578>belly<s%> of the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>.
